long_description:
A texture pack that makes various nodes and items pink! ## ðŸ“– Supported mods ðŸ“– The currently supported mods are all included in [Minetest Game][MTG].
Here's the complete list of supported mods. May be updated in the future: - `beds` (included in [Minetest Game][MTG]). - `binoculars` (included in [Minetest Game][MTG]). - `butterflies` (included in [Minetest Game][MTG]). - `creative` (included in [Minetest Game][MTG]). - `default` (included in [Minetest Game][MTG]). - `doors` (included in [Minetest Game][MTG]). - `farming` (included in [Minetest Game][MTG]). - `fireflies` (included in [Minetest Game][MTG]). - `flowers` (included in [Minetest Game][MTG]). - `player_api` (included in [Minetest Game][MTG]). - `screwdriver` (included in [Minetest Game][MTG]). - `stairs` (included in [Minetest Game][MTG]). - `tnt` (included in [Minetest Game][MTG]). - `vessels` (included in [Minetest Game][MTG]). - `wool` (included in [Minetest Game][MTG]). [MTG]: https://github.com/minetest/minetest_game
name: pink_details
short_description: Makes various color blocks and tools to pink. If you like pink, this is for you!
title: Pink Details
